replies.body: Galio should just go back to being a tank like after they made him into a ap champion first and a tank second  he has caused so many problems like he did not caused a lot of problems as a tank.

kinda? he was specifically an anti mage where his most optimal build was very tank reliant. he could be build as an AP mage but it was a less viable strategy.

What? His optimal build had always been a mix of AP and Defensive Stats, he never was  built purely in one way. Saying that his optimal build was very tank reliant is an overstatement. 

And that is what I believe Riot has tried since his rework, to make him the AP bruiser that is decent in both Damage and Durability. Not a wizard that flaps his wings and murders a guy with one touch, nor an undying titan that smashes people to death for years.

You may consider his Tank version less problematic, but I think it was way worse than Tank Ekko. If Galio counterbuilt his opponent, he couldn't lose the match-up and because of his insane Base Damage in the Early Game, he could pressure any lane with his Ultimate, while stalling his. This guy was a top pick in Mid Lane because no one had his level of pressure and safety.
